resources.string: Select the days you want recurring alarms via checkbox. From time is the time when phone should activate vibrate mode, To time is the time when the phone will be back to Normal mode.
Here you can view your saved schedules. Select the schedule and you can explore more options like deactivating, modifying or deleting that schedule.

Here you can set a non-recurring one time only schedule easily and conveniently. In one time schedule, you can choose the mode i.e. Silent or vibrate. The phone will automatically activate your selected mode at the From time and turn back to normal mode at To time. Currently the app supports only Single one time schedule. More one-time schedules will be supported in future updates.

To cancel, again select one time schedule and you can see your preset one time details are available there. Also, there is an extra cancel button if you have a one time non-recurring schedule set. Just press the cancel button to cancel your one time schedule.
Report bug or provide feedback? Reach me at mithunjmistry@gmail.com. Constructive feedbacks and ideas are always appreciated.

We know that you restart your phone to optimize it and make it run better. So, the app will deactivate all your schedules automatically for you. You can simply open your schedule and activate it again.
Phone will be automatically switched to vibrate mode on Work WiFi and Ringer mode on Home WiFi.
